subject: Fishing, Sport
Canals
lead_paragraph: An eight-hour trip on a giant freight ship through the Panama Canal costs an average of $30,000. Because my wife and I were on a tight budget, we went fishing for peacock bass instead.
snippet: An eight-hour trip on a giant freight ship through the Panama Canal costs an average of $30,000. Because my wife and I were on a tight budget, we went fishing for peacock bass instead.
